text:
We want to use the counter feature in a loop, but it doesn't work.

Start: 3344
Increment: 1
Maximum: 3360

The first time we get the value 3344. That's okay, but the second and third time
we have the same value (3344) as well. If we put the counter inside or outside
the loop doesn't matter.   

H.Grasser: grasser@btbnet.de
creator: grasser@btbnet.de

text:
Reproduced on 1.8. It no longer happens in current CVS code.

Resolving as FIXED.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
